A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies on the list.  I am an original trilogy guy\, i did like parts of the prequels\, but this one...maaan...awesome!  Ignore these weird ratings from 1 and 2 star rates\, they are out of their minds or mad about life\, not Star Wars\, I'm certain they posted a review for some other movie by accident.  Go see it and you will see!
